name: Lily Surface Scraper v1.8.1
body:
## Changelog

 - Add disambiguation messages when one tries to import Materials as Worlds or the other way around
 - Make thumbnails more robust
 - Remove Assets.one scraper, which does not provides anything more than the other sources
 - Use displacement map over bump map in TextureHaven scraper

## Contributors

@eliemichel

name: Lily Surface Scraper v1.8.0 - RC2
Lily Surface Scraper v1.7.5 - RC3
body:
## Changelog

 - Add support for Blender 3.1 on Windows

## Help wanted!

If you are using MacOS or linux, the add-on complains that it **Cannot import name 'etree' from 'lxml'**, you can fix this by running something like this but **adapted to your installation path**:

```
"C:\Program Files\Blender Foundation\Blender 3.1\3.1\python\bin\python.exe" -m pip install lxml -t "C:\Program Files\Blender Foundation\Blender 3.1\3.1\scripts\modules"
```

for instance on MacOS:

```
/Applications/Blender.app/Contents/Resources/3.1/python/bin/python3.10 -m pip install wheel -t /Applications/Blender.app/Contents/Resources/3.1/scripts/modules/
```

Then **please send me** the content of the `lxml` directory it creates in `scripts\modules` so that I can share it with everybody else here!

name: Lily Surface Scraper v1.7.5 - RC2
body:
## Changelog

 - Add support for Apple M1 and pave the way to other ARM-based processors
 - Minor fix in TextureOne based search feature

## Contributors

@eliemichel

name: Lily Surface Scraper v1.7.4
body:
## Changelog

 - Update Texture Haven and Hdri Haven scrapers to match the new Poly Haven website.
 - Restore double sided materials in cgbookcase
 - Delete zip file after download to save disk space

## Contributors

@eliemichel 
@zivoy

name: Lily Surface Scraper v1.7.3
body:
## Changelog

 - Update cgbookcase scraper to match new website.
- **Known Regression** Two sided materials are no longer supported (only one side is loaded)

## Contributors

@eliemichel

name: Lily Surface Scraper v1.7.2
Lily Surface Scraper v1.7.1 - RC1
Lily Surface Scraper v1.6.2
body:
## Changelog

 - Fix HDRI Haven scraper after a change of their URLs.

name: Lily Surface Scraper v1.6.1
body:
## Changelog

 - Add support for IES lights from https://ieslibrary.com

*edit: v1.6.1 is a minor fix over v1.6.0 of the IES scraper when used with the german version of the website.*

name: Lily Surface Scraper v1.5.1
body:
## Changelog

 - Fix automatic node layout

name: Lily Surface Scraper v1.5.0 - RC1
body:
## Changelog

 - Add an option to use this nice trick with envmaps: https://twitter.com/LucaRood/status/1291803450502713344
 - Introduce database.blend to enable future advanced node groups upon import
 - Switch from Textures.one to 3DAssets.one (the site has been renamed) #112
 - Better handles relative path in texture folder (in user preferences) #83

name: Lily Surface Scraper v1.4.1
body:
## Changelog

 - Fix search system
 - Handle absolute urls in cgbookcase scraper

name: Lily Surface Scraper v1.4.0 - RC1
body:
## Changelog

 - lxml issues should be largely fixed (switched back to bundling the package with the addon, installing through pip is too much hassle)

 - A Mapping node is automatically added

 - Various fixes of the scrappers (Texture Haven, Hdri Haven)

 - Add option for using AO maps as a multiplier over the base color (even though it is not technically correct)

name: Lily Surface Scraper v1.3.4 - RC2
body: Try to install the add-on using `LilySurfaceScrapper-v1.3.4-rc2.zip` first. It is more lightweight, but troubles have been reported when using it on OSX or Ubuntu. Only if it does not work then install `LilySurfaceScrapper-BundledLxml-v1.3.4-rc2.zip` but in this case **please fill a report** to explain what was the issue with the first one!

name: Lily Surface Scraper v1.3.4 - RC1
body: The main goal of this release is to be finally working on OSX and Ubuntu, as several people reported bugs regarding the installation of lxml. So, if you have **an error about lxml** when activating the add-on, please open an issue specifying exactly which version of Blender you use, which version of the add-on and which OS. This version will remain RC (release candidate) until this is fixed.

name: Lily Surface Scraper v1.3.3
body:
If you have **an error about lxml** when activating the add-on, try just restarting Blender before activating the add-on again. In most cases, it fixes the issue. If you are using Mac, you can try [this solution](https://github.com/eliemichel/LilySurfaceScrapper/issues/67#issuecomment-616589306). If none of the above solution works for you, please report in [the bug tracker](https://github.com/eliemichel/LilySurfaceScrapper/issues/new/choose). 

## Changelog

 - Fix issues about missing color spaces when setting up color/non-color texture nodes.

 - Update CC0 scraper to acount for changes in the website source code.

 - Add support for extra download links in hdrihaven scrapper. Some pages on HDRIHaven have an extra link to download a tone mapped version of the texture. This crashing the scrapper, now this is fixed and it is even possible to load the tone-mapped version from the add-on.

 - Switch to using API for CC0Textures (more robust and future proof)
 - Handle custom OCIO colorspace config when setting up cycle nodes
 - Various bugfixes

## Contributors

@ogierm
@eliemichel

name: Lily Surface Scraper v1.3.3 - RC1
body:
If you have **an error about lxml** when activating the add-on, try just restarting Blender before activating the add-on again. In most cases, it fixes the issue. If you are using Mac, you can try [this solution](https://github.com/eliemichel/LilySurfaceScrapper/issues/67#issuecomment-616589306). If none of the above solution works for you, please report in [the bug tracker](https://github.com/eliemichel/LilySurfaceScrapper/issues/new/choose). 

## Changelog

 - Update CC0 scraper to acount for changes in the website source code.

 - Add support for extra download links in hdrihaven scrapper. Some pages on HDRIHaven have an extra link to download a tone mapped version of the texture. This crashing the scrapper, now this is fixed and it is even possible to load the tone-mapped version from the add-on.

 - Switch to using API for CC0Textures (more robust and future proof)
 - Handle custom OCIO colorspace config when setting up cycle nodes
 - Various bugfixes

## Contributors

@ogierm
@eliemichel

name: Lily Surface Scraper v1.3.2 - RC3
body:
**This is a Release Candidate, namely a beta release that may have issues.** The main issue that can occur is an error about lxml upon installation. If you run into such trouble (or any trouble actually) please report in [the bug tracker](https://github.com/eliemichel/LilySurfaceScrapper/issues/new/choose). If no issue is reported in the incoming days, this release candidate will become an actual stable release.

## Changelog

 - Update CC0 scraper to acount for changes in the website source code.

 - Add support for extra download links in hdrihaven scrapper. Some pages on HDRIHaven have an extra link to download a tone mapped version of the texture. This crashing the scrapper, now this is fixed and it is even possible to load the tone-mapped version from the add-on.

 - Improve documentation. The front page README has been largely redacted and illustrated.

 - Install lxml using pip. The Python library `lxml` on which we rely used to be savagely packaged in this add-on as precompiled binaries copied from different sources. It now uses Python's library manager (pip) to install lxml if it was missing. This is ensured to be compatible with any OS, avoid duplicating lxml and avoids distributing a partly binary add-on (which was not so GPL compliant).

 - Make it possible to import a world without an active object. The world import buttons were greyed out when no object was active (a leftover from the material importation buttons that must indeed be greyed out in that case).

 - Load preferences properly when installed from master. Nobody should install the add-on from the master's root but in practice many people do (e.g. using the "Download as zip" button on GitHub) so we made the add-on work as well in that case.

## Contributors

@ogierm (special thanks for your support!)
@eliemichel

name: Lily Surface Scraper v1.3.2 - RC2
body:

## Changelog

 - Improve documentation. The front page README has been largely redacted and illustrated.

 - Install lxml using pip. The Python library `lxml` on which we rely used to be savagely packaged in this add-on as precompiled binaries copied from different sources. It now uses Python's library manager (pip) to install lxml if it was missing. This is ensured to be compatible with any OS, avoid duplicating lxml and avoids distributing a partly binary add-on (which was not so GPL compliant).

 - Make it possible to import a world without an active object. The world import buttons were greyed out when no object was active (a leftover from the material importation buttons that must indeed be greyed out in that case).

 - Load preferences properly when installed from master. Nobody should install the add-on from the master's root but in practice many people do (e.g. using the "Download as zip" button on GitHub) so we made the add-on work as well in that case.

## Contributors

@ogierm (special thanks for your support!)
@eliemichel

name: Lily Surface Scraper v1.3.1
body:
You can now setup a global texture folder shared by all the blend files. This way, the textures are not downloaded many times when used in different projects that span across different folders. It is still possible to have the previous behavior by setting a relative path in the settings.

## Changelog

 - Add user preferences to set global texture folder

## Contributors

@eliemichel 
Thanks @vvoovv for suggesting this change.

name: Lily Surface Scraper v1.3.0
body:
**New:** It is now possible to use a local directory path like `C:\TextureLibrary\Sand001\4k` rather than an URL, so that you can use the add-on with your personnal asset library. Not all naming schemes are supported yet, feel free to suggest/report unsupported naming conventions, we'll try to add them.

Demo video: https://youtu.be/BXbNA3nN_HI

## Changelog

 - Add support for local directory importer

## Contributors

@eliemichel 
@ogierm

name: Lily Surface Scraper v1.2.6
body:
Hopefully completely fix the CC0Textures scrapper.

## Changelog

 - Switch back from using API to scrapping CC0Textures. The API is handy, but because an update is going on on their side it is no longer reliable.

name: Lily Surface Scraper v1.2.5
body:
Fix for v1.2.4

Known limitation: won't work on textures newly updated on CC0Textures as long as we rely on the old API. Coming up soon.

name: Lily Surface Scraper v1.2.4
Lily Surface Scraper v1.2.3
body:
Fake a standard user agent to prevent texture providers such as CC0 textures from blocking our requests.

## Changelog

 - Fake user agent

## Contributors

@eliemichel

name: Lily Surface Scraper v1.2.2
body:
Small fix after an update of CC0Textures.

## Changelog

 - Fix issue with new cc0textures urls

## Contributors

@eliemichel

name: Lily Surface Scraper v1.2.1
body:
This is a minor update, just adding lxml binaries for darwin architecture, hence the add-on is now supported on OSX/MacOS.

## Changelog

 - Add support for OSX

## Contributors

@eliemichel 
[@Macwelshman](https://blenderartists.org/u/Macwelshman) (on blenderartists.org)

name: Lily Surface Scraper v1.2.0
body:
Improve UI, support two sided materials and fix some bugs

## Changelog

 - Add a "import from clipboard" button for even quicker material import (no need to paste)
 - Handle two-sided materials available on cgbookcase.com
 - Use the new alpha slot of Principled BSDF node
 - Add buttons pointing to material sources
 - Use the XML API of CC0Textures for more robustness to future changes
 - Fix cgbookcase scrapper
 - Fix remaining colorspace issues

## Contributors

@eliemichel 
@alisherks
@ogierm

name: Lily Surface Scraper v1.1.4
body:
Some bugfixes.

## Changelog

 - Tested on official 2.80 release
 - Update the cc0textures scrapper to comply fit a recent design update of the third party website
 - Fix issue with non-English UIs

## Contributors

@eliemichel 
@alisherks

name: Lily Surface Scraper v1.1.3
body:
Small bugfix.

## Changelog

 - Fix issue with texture color spaces due to an API change in Blender

name: Lily Surface Scraper v1.1.0
body:
Introducing Sky Scrapping!

![Lily Surface Scrapper for worlds](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/eliemichel/LilySurfaceScrapper/master/doc/world.png)

## Changelog

 - Add lxml binaries for linux
 - Add World scrapping
 - New source: HDRI Haven https://hdrihaven.com/

name: Lily Surface Scraper v1.0.1
body:
New minor update, to test the flexibility of adding a new scrapper.

## Changelog

 - Added a new source: https://texturehaven.com

name: Lily Surface Scraper v1.0.0
body:
This is the first release of Lily Surface Scrapper, supporting the following two sources:

 - cgbookcase: https://www.cgbookcase.com/
 - CC0Textures: https://cc0textures.com/

Feel free to suggest new sources, or even implement them. See the [README](https://github.com/eliemichel/LilySurfaceScrapper) for more information.
